creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: thin, wispy stems explode into dense, voluminous sprays of pointed bamboo leaves; three stalks at bottom extend towards center; two other stalks begin near center and blossom at upper edge; inscription along LL; four total seals
inscription: 我笔一揮戞然玉鳴非蘆非麻紙上有聲
markings: ULQ, square intaglio; center, L edge, oval relief; LLQ, square intaglio; LLC, square relief
title: Leafy Bamboo
